A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A wasted opportunity to build upon The Force Awakens\, several key characters die pointless deaths that don't further the plot. Numerous attempts at humour whilst each on their own are probably ok\, by the halfway point of the movie you are sick of the protagonists making wise cracks at inappropriate moments. Continues to play on the \"who are rey's parents?\" suspense\, which if you watch the two movies back to back\, just seems like \"why are they making such a big deal about this\" \nMark Hamil said it best when he said he \"fundamentally disagrees with virtually everything written for his character\" the film makes bold choices for key characters\, but doesn't deliver them in a way that is believable.
